statements: DELETE FROM digital_asset_ownership WHERE owner_id = 456 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM digital_asset_ownership WHERE asset_id = 100 AND owner_id = 200 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM digital_asset_ownership WHERE token_amount > 10000 AND token_type = 'fungible';
DELETE FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_name = 'Sample Asset' AND owner_address = '0x123456789abcdef' AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM digital_asset_metadata WHERE asset_name = 'Example Asset 1';
DELETE FROM asset_transactions WHERE transaction_type='purchase' AND transaction_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM digital_asset_metadata WHERE asset_type='image' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
